  • Field Details

    • accounts

      private Account[] accounts

    • numAcct

      private int numAcct

    • NOT_FOUND

      public static final int NOT_FOUND
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountDatabase

      public AccountDatabase()
      This is the constructor that creates an array-based data structure. It's initial capacity is 4 and numAcct is set to 0.

  • Method Details

    • getNumAcct

      public int getNumAcct()
      Returns:
      - int which is the number of accounts that Accounts array is currently holding.

    • find

      private int find(Account account)
      This function finds whether the passed in account object exists in the AccountDatabase object or not.
      Parameters:
      account - - the account object that needs to be found
      Returns:
      - int which is the index at which the passed in account is found, otherwise returns NOT_FOUND.

    • getAccountIfExists

      public Account getAccountIfExists(Account account)
      This function finds whether the passed in account object exists in the Account array and returns that account.
      Parameters:
      account - - account object that is being checked if it exists
      Returns:
      account if found, null if NOT_FOUND

    • grow

      private void grow()
      This function grows the array-based container size by 4 when the array gets full, by creating a new array and copying all the elements from current array to the new array.

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      This function adds a new account object to AccountDatabase array.
      Parameters:
      account - - The account object that needs to be added.
      Returns:
      true only after when the account gets added to array successfully.

    • reOpen

      public boolean reOpen(Account account)
      This function finds and reopens an account object from the array-based container in AccountDatabase
      Parameters:
      account - - account object that needs to be reopened in the array
      Returns:
      true when the account object is reopened and false when it's not found

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      This function finds and sets the balance of the account object from the array-based container in AccountDatabase to 0 and sets the account's boolean closed variable to true.
      Parameters:
      account - - The account object that needs to be closed.
      Returns:
      false if the account object does not exist, true if account is successfully closed.

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)
      This function finds the account in the database and adds in an amount to the current balance of the account.
      Parameters:
      account - - account object in which the balance needs to be added.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      This function deducts an amount from the current balance of the account.
      Parameters:
      account - - Account object from which the balance needs to be removed.
      Returns:
      - true if the amount is available to withdraw from the account's balance and the account exists. - false if the amount is greater than the available balance or if the account doesn't exist.

    • print

      public String print()
      This function prints all the accounts in the database.
      Returns:
      - String representing all the information of each account object in the array line by line

    • printByAccountType

      public String printByAccountType()
      This function prints all the accounts in the database by their account type.
      Returns:
      - String representing all the information of each account object in the array line by line, but ordered by each account type alphabetically

    • printFeeAndInterest

      public String printFeeAndInterest()
      This function prints the monthly fees and interests of all account types in the database.
      Returns:
      - String representing all the information along with the fee and monthly interest of each account object in the array line by line

    • printWithUpdatedBalance

      public String printWithUpdatedBalance()
      This function prints all account types in the database with the updated balances after deposits, withdrawals, closures, fee and monthly interest.
      Returns:
      - String representing all the information with the updated balance from after the fee, monthly interest, deposits, withdrawals, and closures calculations of each account object in the array line by line

    • sortByAccountType

      private void sortByAccountType()
      This function is a helper to sort all accounts by their type alphabetically.

    • updateBalance

      private void updateBalance()
      This function is a helper to update the balances after deposits, withdrawals, and closures, fee and monthly interest.
